article.title: Special Forces Procures Inflatable Antennas
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: GATR Technologies Incorporated, Huntsville, Alabama, is being awarded a $37 million single-award indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the GATR inflatable antenna, components, technical support, and training in support of U.S. Special Operations Command.Â U.S. Special Operations Command, MacDill Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
